item.title: Perhaps the issue of double posting is solved by not modifying the older entries ✏️. I decided to put the newest entries on top. I guess I don't really even need the html export and can just refer readers to https://micro.blog/kinnala.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)

item.title: I noticed the hyperlinks in the entries ✏️ are visible as plaintext urls. Also there was some issue of duplicate entries appearing in Timeline after fixing a typo.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)

item.title: Connecting the resulting blog to https://micro.blog/ requires just the url kinnala.github.io/blog/index.xml. However, I noticed org-mode titles are interpreted as the actual entries ✏️. This means the html export puts everything inside h1 tags. Perhaps the html export requires tinkering at some point.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)

item.title: I wanted to blog with Emacs to https://micro.blog/. First I created https://github.com/kinnala/blog with index.org and enabled Pages from its settings. Then I installed https://github.com/emacsmirror/ox-rss. Finally I wrote ✏️ this entry in index.org, ran org-rss-export-to-rss and org-html-export-to-html, and committed the resulting files.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)
